title: Man holding a pro-Facebook banner
description: Photographer's description: Anti-Mubarak Protester holding a sign reading thank you young people of facebook. Text in image: شكرا شباب الفيس بوك.  Translation of text in image: Thank you, young people of Facebook.
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Online social networks; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
